thread.title: Perfect experience to make NY even better
thread.title_full: Perfect experience to make NY even better - Review of The Ritz-Carlton New York, Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jennifermD520DA
title: Perfect experience to make NY even better
text: This is my second time staying in this particular hotel. The hotel and service was everything you would expect from a Ritz Carlton. Proximity to everything is great and walking distance to most attractions as well as Broadway, Shopping and the Park. Thank you!
